item.title: Judge orders USAID payments to some foreign aid groups by Monday
item.description: Judge Amir H. Ali set a noon Friday deadline for the Trump administration and aid organizations to clarify how much more the groups are owed.

item.title: Touting jobs report, Trump distinguishes between immigrants and ‘native-born Americans’
Live updates: Trump threatens ‘large scale’ sanctions on Russia after its major attack on Ukraine
item.description: The latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the new Congress.

item.title: In Europe’s north, soldiers train amid worries over Trump’s belief in NATO
Trump threatens ‘large scale’ sanctions on Russia after major attack on Ukraine
item.description: Trump’s threat followed Russia’s first major missile attack against Ukraine since the Trump administration paused intelligence sharing with the embatt...
